issue.title: Create script to clean up after gazebo crash.

content.raw:
I would expect you to see the following sequence of events:

1. start the task, see the task light blink yellow, then blink blue
1. do some work
1. gazebo crashes, the task light blinks yellow again

At that point, have you tried pressing "Stop current task.."?  It should bring everything down, resulting in a red task light when finished.
